title: Gemini 3 Pro vs AssemblyAI: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs AssemblyAI. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and AssemblyAI? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs AssemblyAI
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2025 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

AssemblyAI (audio ai) is AssemblyAI is a leading API platform for converting speech to text and extracting insights from audio and video data. It provides production-ready, high-accuracy models for core transcription, speaker diarization, and advanced NLP tasks like sentiment analysis, entity detection, and content moderation. It uniquely targets developers and enterprises with a simple API, fast processing, and a focus on building scalable, real-world AI applications for audio.. Users choose it for speech-to-text, audio-intelligence, transcription-api.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

AssemblyAI: Core Transcription: High-accuracy speech-to-text for audio/video files and real-time streams., Speaker Diarization: Automatically labels and separates speech by different speakers., Audio Intelligence: Suite of NLP models (Sentiment Analysis, Entity Detection, Topic Detection, Content Moderation, PII Redaction).

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and AssemblyAI are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, AssemblyAI for speech-to-text.
